src:
Dalas gazi otpisane Džajantse
Kaubojsi veliki favoriti u Njujorku u poslednjoj utkmici devete nedelje NFL šampionata. Pobeda imperativ za tim iz Teksasa

04 Nov 2019

Filladelfija je slavila u nedelju protiv Čikaga, izbila na čelo istoka NFC-a, ali priliku da se vrati na prvo mesto divizije ima Dalas. Na papiru, Kaubojsi imaju lak zadatak protiv otpisanih Džajantsa (utorak, 02.15), koji su sa samo dve pobede daleko i od priče o plej-ofu.
Dalas je imao nedelju pauze, u poslednjem meču Dak Preskot i drugovi su preslišali Filadelfiju i prekinuli niz od tri uzastopna poraza. Njujorčani su u fazi renoviranja ekipe. Već posle dva poraza u prva dva kola trener Pet Šurman je odlučio da van terena ostavi vremešnog Ilaja Meninga, osvajača dva Superbola. Šansu je dobio mladi kvoterbek Danijel Džons. Dobro je krenuo, vezao dve pobede, protiv Tampe Beja u gostima i Vašingtona kod kuće na Met Lajf stadionu, ali je onda usledilo bolno prizemljenje i četiri poraza u nizu.


NFL - KVOTE ZA OSVAJAČE





Njujorčani nemaju sreće ni sa povredama. Prvi risiver Sterling Šepard i dalje je van terena zbog potresa mozga. Povrede tokom sezone imali su i raning bek Sekuan Barkli i tajt end Evan Ingram, dok je najveće pojačanje između dve sezone, iskusni Golden Tejt propustio prva četiri susreta zbog kazne.
Dalas je na startu sezone bio silovit, gazio je sve, ali je onda usletila loša serija koja je prekinuta demoliranjem Iglsa, ljutog divizijskog rivala. Sve je bolja prva zvezda tima, snažni raning bek Ezekijel Eliot, koji je uspeo štrajkom pre početka sezone da gazdu Kaubojsa Džerija Džonsa natera na potpis ugovora koji će mu doneti 15.000.000 dolara godišnje. Da tim iz Teksasa ima velike ambicije dokaz je i to što se iz penzije vratio legendarni tajt end Džejson Viten kako bi pomogao mladom timu da stigne do Suprboula i trofeja Vinsa Lombardja.
U prvom kolu novog šampionata, Dalas je lako pobedio na svom terenu tim iz Velike jabuke sa 35:17. Kaubojsi su u seriji pobeda protiv Njuorčana. Imaju pet trijumfa u nizu. Prošle sezone u Njujorku, Dalas je slavio posle neizvesne završnice sa 36:35.
Očekuje se pobeda gostiju, koji će do kraja sezone da vode ljutu bitku sa Filadelfijom za čelo uvek nepredvidivog istoka NFC-a.

NFL – DEVETA NEDELJA


Petak

Arizona – San Francisko 25:28 (7:7, 0:14, 7:7, 11:0)

Nedelja

Denver - Klivlend 24:19 (7:0, 10:12, 7:0, 0:7)
Los Anđeles Čardžers – Grin Bej 26:11 (6:0, 3:0, 10:3, 7:8)

Utorak



02.15: (3,70) Njujork Džajants (14,00) Dalas (1,35)


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama



Foto: Reuters
text:
Dallas tramples the written off Jayantsa
The Cowboys are big favorites in New York in the final whiff of the ninth week of the NFL Championship. Winning is imperative for the Texas team

04 Nov 2019

Philadelphia celebrated Sunday against Chicago, broke out at the forefront of the NFC East, but Dallas has a chance to return to the top division. On paper, the Cowboys have an easy task against the written-off Giants (Tuesday, 2:15 p.m.), who are just two wins away from the playoffs.
Dallas had a week of break, in the last match Dak Prescott and the comrades overplayed Philadelphia and interrupted a series of three consecutive defeats. The New Yorkers are in the process of renovating the team. After two defeats in the first two rounds, coach Pet Schurman decided to leave the then-Eli Menning, the winner of two Superballs, off the field. The chance was given to young quarterback Daniel Jones. He started well, tying two wins, against Tampa Bay away and Washington at home at Matt Life Stadium, but then followed a painful grounding and four straight defeats.


NFL - QUOTES FOR WINNERS





New Yorkers are not happy with injuries either. Sterling Shepard's first receiver is still out of the field due to a concussion. Sekuan Barkley and tight end Evan Ingram also suffered injuries during the season, while the biggest gain between the two seasons, experienced Golden Tate, missed the first four meetings due to a penalty.
Dallas was violent at the start of the season, treading everything, but then a bad streak broke in, which was cut short by demolishing the Eagles, an angry division rival. The team’s first star, strong running back Ezekiel Elliott, is getting better by striking out before the start of the season to force Cowboys boss Jerry Jones to sign a deal that will get him $ 15,000,000 a year. That the Texas team has great ambitions is also evidenced by the retirement of legendary tight end Jason Witten to help the young team reach the Suprboul and the Vince Lombard Trophy.
In the first round of the new championship, Dallas easily beat the Big Apple team with 35:17 on its field. The Cowboys are in a series win against New Yorkers. They have five triumphs in a row. Last season in New York, Dallas celebrated after an uncertain finish with 36:35.
The win for the guests is expected to lead an angry battle with Philadelphia for the forefront of the ever-unpredictable East of the NFC by the end of the season.

NFL - NINTH WEEK
